name: vue-colors
description: Highlight script, template and style in unique colors! Either the entire line or just the scrollbar.

vueColors.scriptColor.description: The background color of the javascript/typescript code (please use rgba only). Used for both line color and scrollbar color.

vueColors.htmlColor.description: The background color of the HTML template code (please use rgba only). Used for both line color and scrollbar color.

vueColors.styleColor.description: The background color of the (S)CSS code (please use rgba only). Used for both line color and scrollbar color.

vueColors.highlightLine.description: Wether to highlight the entire line using the specified colors.

vueColors.highlightScrollbar.description: Wether to highlight the right side of the scrollbar using the specified colors. (Colors will be slightly less transparent on the scrollbar to make it more visible)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
